index.name: Designing Native Apps
index.tagline: How to design with components from the Astro framework alongside the PWA SDK.

blocks.title: Fundamentals
blocks.info: An introduction to delivering Progressive Web Apps as native iOS and Android apps using the Astro framework.

blocks.title: Native app patterns
blocks.info: Important tips for designers including how web views work alongside native views.

blocks.title: Components
blocks.info: Using the UI kit to design a native experience within the application.

blocks.title: Best practice layouts
blocks.info: Examples of how native components should be used in place of PWA components to create shopping templates on native apps.

designing-native-apps.title: Guides
designing-native-apps.intro: How to design with components from the Astro framework alongside the PWA SDK.
